definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bind, league together, conspire (NH id., bind, join, [[קֶשֶׁר]] knot; Targum [[קְטַר]], Syr. qt.ar bind ([[ט]] for [[ת]] after [[ק]]) Nö:ZMG xi.735, who cp. also (‘perh.’) Ar. qasara force to do a thing, Eth. q=as’ara: bind);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[קָשַׁר]] Am 7:10, 1Ki 16:16; 2 ms. sf. [[וּקְשַׁרְתָּם]] consec. De 6:8, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּקְשׁׂר]] 1Ki 15:27 +, [[וַיִּקְשָׁר־]] 2Ki 15:30, etc.; Imv. ms. sf. [[קָשְׁרֵם]] Pr 3:3 +; Pt. act. pl. [[קשְׁרִים]] 2Sa 15:31 +; pass. fs. [[קְשׁוּרָה]] Ge 44:30, Pr 22:15; pl. [[קְשֻׁרִים]] Ge 30:42;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit., c. acc. rei + [[עַל]] Ge 38:28 (J), Je 51:63, + [[ב]], Jos 2:18, Jos 2:21 (JE); bind, confine, c. acc. [[רֵים]] Job 39:10 (+ [[בְּתֶלֶם]]), acc. of crocod. Job 40:29.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: fig., c. acc. + [[עַל]] De 6:8, De 11:18, Pr 3:3, Pr 6:21, Pr 7:3 (all of religious and moral precepts); c. [[ב]], [[נַפְשׁוֹ קְשׁוּרָה בְנַפְשׁוֹ]] Ge 44:30 his life is bound up with his [viz. the boy’s] life (J; of strong affection); [[בְלֶב־נׇ֑עַר]] ´[[אִוֶּלֶת ק]]: Pr 22:15.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: pt. pass. vigorous (prop. well- knit; opp. [[עֲטֻפִים]]) Ge 30:42 (J).

league together, conspire: c. [[על]] pers. against 1Sa 22:8, 1Sa 22:13, Am 7:10, 1Ki 15:27, 1Ki 16:9, 2Ki 10:9, 2Ki 15:10, 2Ki 15:25, 2Ki 21:23, 2Ki 21:24 = 2Ch 33:24, 2Ch 33:25, 2Ch 24:21; c. acc. cogn. [[קֶשֶׁר]], 1Ki 16:20, 2Ki 12:21, 2Ki 15:15, + [[עַל]] pers. 2Ki 14:19 = 2Ch 25:27, 2Ki 15:30; abs. 1Ki 16:16, Ne 4:2 (+ inf. purpose); c. [[עִם]], together with, 2Sa 15:31.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[נִקְשְׁרָה]] 1Sa 18:1 the life of Jonathan was bound up with the life of D. (

definitions.body: ); Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּקָּשֵׁר כָּל־הַחוֹמָה]] Ne 3:38 all the wall was joined together (the circuit complete).
bind on (as ornament), 2 fs. sf. [[וּתְקַשְּׁרִים]] Is 49:18 (fig.; ‖[[תִּלְבְּשִׁי ]]).
bind fast, 2 ms. [[תְקַשּׁר]]([[הַ]]) [[מַעֲדַנּוֹת כִּימָה]] Job 38:31 canst thou bind fast the bands of the Pleiades?

definitions.body: ); Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּתְקַשּׁר אֶל־]] 2Ki 9:14; Pt. pl. [[הַמִּתְקַשְּׁרִים עָלָיו]] 2Ch 24:26.
